snippet: As the English Premier League begins its long season on Saturday, the defending champion, Manchester City, will contend with the usual favorites for a title.
abstract: England's Premier League begins its season with several changes in team lineups; league's top returning scorer Robin van Persie moves from Arsenal to Manchester United, hoping to help his team dethrone crosstown rival Manchester City, which will begin defense of its title with the usual favorites.
lead_paragraph: As the English Premier League begins its long season on Saturday, the defending champion, Manchester City, will contend with the usual favorites for a title.

headline.seo: Manchester City in Spotlight as Premier League Opens
headline.main: In England’s Premier League, Many Suitors for the Top Spot
headline.print_headline: In England’s Premier League, Many Suitors for the Top Spot
